shortTermPriceSubtitle: This section will include the price for nightly and block of 4 hours, some surcharges and fee (Note: price must included 20% commission of Westay and input as VND)
priceByDaySubtitle: This price is for one night (other surchages not included), included 20% Westay's commission.
priceByHoursSubtitle: This price is for first block of 4 hours(other surchages not included), included 20% Westay's commission.
surchargeAdditionalGuestsSubtitle: This prices will be calculate per guest - per night/hours and will automatic add to booking total fee
surchargeAdditionalHoursSubtitle: This prices will be apply for each hours over the checkout time.
cleaningFeeSubtitle: This prices will always be apply for booking if you set the prices
minPriceDay: Min prices per day is 250.000 VND (about 10$)
minPriceHours: Min prices per 4 hours block is 100.000 VND (about 10$)
longTermPriceSubtitle: This part include the information of monthly prices which included the Westay 10% commision. (Note: All price below will be show as per month in VND)
longTerm12MonthPrices: Price for more than 12 months rent
longTerm1MonthPricesSubtitle: This is prices for less than 2 months rental, this is also the deposit key fee for each booking
suggestPrice: is the average discount for this rent period ( compare to 1 - 2 months term )
minLongTermPrice: The min prices for this term is 5.000.000 VNƒê (250 USD)
allFeeIncludedSubtitle: Rent prices is included all services above.
allFeeNotIncludedSubtitle: The rent prices not included all services above.
feeSelectionSubtitle: Please check the prices not included in the rent price and the way it be calculated
listFee: This section is about the following services:
